sentences.sContent: You have to practice and see the real gull, the good in every one of them, and to help them see it in themselves.
sentences.sContent_eng: You have to practice and see the real gull, the good in every one of them, and to help them see it in themselves.
sentences.sCn: 你应该通过练习去认识真正的海鸥，要看到每只海鸥的美德，并帮助他们去认识自己的美德。

remMethod.val: 一只海鸥(gull)落在一只呆呆的(dull)公牛(bull)背上

trans.tranOther: a large common black and white sea bird that lives near the sea
